Notice at Collection

Affordable Tax Relief , LLC is collecting your personal information and sensitive personal information to support its business operations, including for the business purposes listed in the chart below. We collect only a limited amount of sensitive personal information.

We will not sell the personal information, including any sensitive personal information, we collect or share it with third parties for cross-context behavioral advertising.

To view our full privacy policy, visit privacy.

Retention of Personal Information and Sensitive Personal Information

We take reasonable steps to ensure your personal information, including your sensitive personal information, is retained for the minimum period necessary to achieve the purposes described in this Notice.   1. We will retain your information for as long as: We maintain an ongoing relationship with you (for example, while you remain an employee or a partner in our tax partner network); or Your information is reasonably necessary for the purposes described in this Notice.
  2. The duration of any applicable limitation period prescribed under applicable law; and
  3. In the event any legal claims are anticipated or brought, we may continue to retain your information for such
    additional periods as are necessary in connection with that claim.

During the time we retain your personal information and sensitive personal information, we will limit our use of that information to the storage of that information, except to the extent that information is needed for the purposes described in this Notice or such information needs to be reviewed in connection with any legal claim or other obligation under applicable law.

To the extent applicable or permitted under applicable law, upon the conclusion of the time periods described above we will

  1. permanently delete or destroy the relevant personal information and sensitive personal information, or
  2. archive your personal information and sensitive personal information so that it is beyond use; or
